manifest.author: datawitch
manifest.name: Recursive Copy
manifest.description: Recursively copies all markdown files in a folder, concatenates them, and copies them into the clipboard. Useful for quickly loading context into AI. Can be triggered by right clicking a folder and selecting the context menu item, or by binding a key (will copy everything in the active file's folder).
